title: Zoey Searches for Zero
description: Zoey is an armadillo who really loves numbers. She's always counting the things that are around her and that makes her happy. She has just one problem... she can't find the number zero anywhere. She needs your help. Even if she's smart enough to know what the number zero looks like, she may not really know what it means. Do you?
author: Jennifer Jayne Scobie
